verses.roman:
govinda-ghoṣa-pradhāna kaila āra sampradāya
haridāsa, viṣṇudāsa, rāghava, yāhāṅ gāya

synonyms: govinda-ghoṣa—Govinda Ghosh; pradhāna—the chief; kaila—formed; āra—another; sampradāya—group; haridāsa—the younger Haridāsa; viṣṇudāsa—Viṣṇudāsa; rāghava—Rāghava; yāhāṅ—where; gāya—sing.
translation: The Lord formed another group, appointing Govinda Ghosh as leader. In this group the younger Haridāsa, Viṣṇudāsa and Rāghava were the responding singers.
